name: Mormesk the Wraith

traits: Greedy for treasure he can't touch
personality.speech: Grave whispers. 'Your presence is offensive to me, your life forfeit. My treasures are mine alone, not yours to plunder!'
personality.appearance: Rises from floor. Ghostly wizard form.

background: Powerful mage. Died in spell battle when orcs attacked. Centuries of anger poisoned soul into wraith.
role: Leads undead in Wave Echo Cave. Can't leave his treasure room (obsession).
treasure: Scorched chest: 1100 cp, 160 sp, 50 ep, 3 diamonds (100 gp each), wooden pipe with platinum filigree (150 gp)
books: Magically preserved tomes (mostly histories). One has map sewn in cover (DC 12 Investigation). Map shows location of dungeon of DM's creation (future adventure hook).

negotiation.rude: If harmed or property seized, attacks immediately
negotiation.polite: If respectful and offer magic item/scrolls/spellbook/arcane knowledge, makes DC 10 Persuasion check
negotiation.deal: Won't give up pipe, but will trade coins/gems if party kills spectator in Forge of Spells (area 15)
negotiation.books: If given gift, allows party to read books and keep secret map
